name: Assassin's Wrist Mounted Gun
description: A concealed gun favored by assassins. The gun springs open and can fire up to 5 silenced shots. Illegal in most cities and will raise eyebrows in others.

abilities.name: Hidden Weapon
abilities.description: If someone is searching for weapons on your body, they need to pass a DC 20 investigation check to find this weapon.
